title: HTTP (Hypertext Transfer Protocol)
desc: HTTP (Hypertext Transfer Protocol) is an application-layer protocol for transmitting hypermedia documents, such as HTML, and is the foundation of data communication on the World Wide Web.

title: HTTPS (Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure)
desc: HTTPS (Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure) is the secure version of HTTP, utilizing encryption protocols such as TLS to ensure secure communication over a computer network.
